short_summary: IM/IT Project Executives for multiple interdependent projects within the Bureau.
description: IM/IT Bureau has the need for multiple Project Executives (up to 7) for the delivery and oversight of a series of transformational projects. PE resources work closely with GAC senior management and Project Management Office (PMO) to lead project initiatives.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)

### Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS)

The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (Global Affairs Canada) is issuing a notice of proposed procurement (NPP) for Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS), solicitation number 24-251722.

### Description of Work

Multiple Project Executive (PE) resources are required to support the IM/IT Bureau in the delivery and oversight of a series of transformational projects. The PE resources will work closely with senior management and the Project Management Office (PMO) to lead project initiatives within the Bureau.

### Key Requirements

* Establish procedures for the development and implementation of various project components
* Execute, monitor, and report on project status to IM/IT management
* Determine change management and user engagement strategies
* Report project updates to governance committees, as required

### Estimated Resources

7 Project Executives (PE) with Level 3 expertise

### Tendering Procedure

Selective tendering procedure is followed, open only to qualified TBIPS Supply Arrangement Holders with Tier 1 status in the National Capital Region for the aforementioned categories.

### Contract Duration

One-year initial contract period with an option for a one-year extension

### Trade Agreements

* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement (CHFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement (CColFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement (CPanFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

### Contact Information
